newsitem.title: USA: Alpha Technologies unit raises prices 7 pct.
newsitem.headline: Alpha Technologies unit raises prices 7 pct.

text.p: Alpha Technologies Group Inc on Thursday said its unit, Wakefield Engineering Inc, will raise prices on its thermal management products an average of seven percent, effective April 25.

"Due to the growing complexity and higher engineering content of our thermal management products, we believe that higher selling prices are warranted," Lawrence Butler, chief executive officer, said in a statement.
He noted Wakefield has not implemented across the board price increases since it was bought by Alpha in October 1993.
